scripts.init: bun run clean && bun install --recursive && bun run init:shared && bun run typegen
scripts.typegen: bun run typegen:studio && bun run typegen:next
scripts.typegen:next: cp ./studio/schema.json ./next-app && cd next-app && bun run typegen
scripts.update:test: bun run --filter '*' clean && cp ./studio/package.json ./studio/package.test.json && cp ./next-app/package.json ./next-app/package.test.json && bun update --recursive --latest --no-cache --dry-run --verbose --no-save
scripts.update:full: bun run --filter '*' clean && bun update --recursive --latest --no-cache && bun install --recursive
